entry.title: Adding additional columns in WLF_IDOC ALV List
entry.content:
We have a requirement where we need to add additional columns( for example, column material number) to the ALV List that comes in the second screen of Tcode WLF_IDOC. These columns need to be filled by data from segments( for example, 'ZMaterial' from segment) of the IDOC, and if a certain segment does not exist we keep it blank.

I have found a Enhancement Spot 'WLF_IDOC_PROCESSING' .  I found the below BADI with the description can be used to change fields in ALV LIST. 

I tried implementing the above BADI but it is not getting triggered. I made it the default implementation but still the implementation is not getting called. 

I need to add the columns and then fill the field with the values. 

Can  somebody please suggest a solution ?

ABAP Development  SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP, version for SAP HANA SAP ERP

entry.title: Is it possible to change the Date in field BKPF-BLDAT in Accounting Document.
entry.content:
I want to change the date in Document Date Field BKPF-BLDAT.  ACCHD Structure is used to pass data to BKPF But in ACCHD structure the BLDAT is not present. So, is it possible to modify the date using some exit or enhancement?
Tcode: VF01/VF02/VF03.

entry.title: Do we need to scheudle a job for report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE to update shortages in Fiori Apps?
entry.content:
Dear Gurus,

While setting up MRP and the most relevant Fiori apps, I have come across an issue related to some Fiori apps (Monitor External Requirements, Manage External Requirements...).

After checking SAP note 3603703, I decided to run report PPH_MRP_SET_CACHE and update entries and I got the Fiori apps showing the correct data.

However, I wanted to know if this was actually something we would need to schedule in the background? I was expecting the information to be fully synch in Fiori with S4HANA. Is it not the case or might have be missing some configurations or activations?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: MRP Not Converting Demand from Old to New Materials in BOM with Dependent Parallel Discontinuation
entry.content:
Issue: MRP is creating negative requirements on discontinued components instead of converting demand to follow-up materials in a phantom BOM structure.

Setup:

  • Phantom BOM with components A, B, C converting to X, Y, Z
  • Using ECN with dependent parallel configuration via follow-up groups
  • BOM structure:
    • Line item 0021 (FolGp 01): Component A (old) + Component X (new)
    • Line item 0022 (FolGp 01): Component B (old) + Component Y (new)
    • Line item 0023 (FolGp 01): Component C (old) + Component Z (new)
    • All items valid from 10/28/2025
    • Is this perhaps because I have duplicated line items, one with old, one with new? See picture for better BOM setup.

 

 

Material Master Settings:

  • Component A: Disc indicator 1, follow-up material = X
  • Components B & C: Disc indicator 3, no follow-up in material master
  • Follow-up groups configured in BOM discontinuation data (DisGp 01 → FolGp 01)

Problem: When MRP runs and stock depletes on old components, it continues generating negative requirements on A/B/C instead of converting demand to X/Y/Z. Tested with temporary production order and it appeared to work, but actual MRP run doesn't convert, as shown from MD04 transaction on component A. It does appear that the effective out date is considered. It even generated one PO for January '26 for 30pcs.

 

Question: Is there something specific about how MRP handles discontinuation with phantom BOMs? Do I need different effectivity dates on old vs new components, or is there a configuration issue with how the follow-up groups are set up?

Any help appreciated - this is blocking our component transition.

entry.title: Transformation from DTAZV to pain 001.001.09 New EBS Formats
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m working on replacing the old DTAZV format with pain.001.001.09 in our SAP ECC (R/3) system.
The pain.001.001.09 format is already implemented and works correctly in other payment scenarios(In F110) and this was done by following 2253571 SAP Note, but for this specific case( Auslandsüberweisung ) the generated EBS is not valid according to the bank requirements.

I am aware of SAP Note 3187339, but since we are on an ECC/R3 system, the note is not applicable to our release.

My question is:

Does this mean that on R/3 the transformation from DTAZV to pain.001.001.09 must be manually adjusted (DMEE/customizing), or is there any SAP-delivered configuration for this format that I might be missing?

If anyone has experience with this transition on ECC, I would appreciate any guidance or best practices.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Inspection lots with blocked UD assignment
entry.content:
Dear QM Specialist,
I'm having a problem with Inspection Lots: I can't assign a Decision Unit (DU) to close them. I need to close about 80,000 inspection lots, but they all have a specific item missing, for example, "Missing Confirmation Certificate". Is it possible to remove this requirement from the inspection lot and assign the DU to it, given that the item has already been released, leaving only the blocked inspection lot?

entry.title: Customer Return(A2X) API and In-House Repair API Combination of any another API is available?
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Good Day!

Is there any API available that combines Customer Return API and In-House Repair?

Overview | Customer Return (A2X) | SAP Business Accelerator Hub 

Try Out | In-House Repair | SAP Business Accelerator Hub 

I have checked the APIs and found no relationship between the two. Could you please provide details of a combination API, any relationship information, or release CDS views.

Regards,

Srini.

entry.title: Posting type 4 or 5 in electronic bank statement - bank clearing account to be searched
entry.content:
Is it possible with posting type 4 or 5 to include an account symbol so that it is taken into account into FEBEP-AVKON/FEBCL-AGKON? 

In the most cases we need to have FEBEP-AVKON/FEBCL-AGKON in posting area 2 to be equal to the bank clearing account from posting area 1, but then FEBEP-AVKON/FEBCL-AGKON is empty unless we define search strings to define the account nr for every company code/house bank/account id combination

entry.title: S/4HANA–Does Leading Ledger 0L Require the Same Fiscal Year and Posting Period Variant for All CoCo?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

I am facing an issue related to the Leading Ledger 0L in SAP S/4HANA, and I would like to clarify the correct concept.

Background:
In ECC, I worked with ledger 0L, where multiple company codes were assigned, and each company code had:

  • Different Fiscal Year Variants (FYV)

  • Different Posting Period Variants (PPV)

This worked without any issue in ECC.

Current Issue in S/4HANA:
In S/4HANA, when I try to maintain or open T-code: FINSC_LEDGER, I get an error related to data inconsistency. I have shared screenshots below.

 

While searching online, I found multiple references stating that:

All company codes assigned to leading ledger 0L must have the same Fiscal Year Variant and Posting Period Variant.

This is confusing to me because it was possible in ECC to have different FYV and PPV under the same leading ledger.

My Questions:

1.   In S/4HANA, is it mandatory that all company codes assigned to the leading ledger 0L must have the same:

  • Fiscal Year Variant?

  • Posting Period Variant?

2.   If yes, why was this restriction introduced in S/4HANA, and how does it technically impact:

  • Universal Journal (ACDOCA)?

  • Cross-company reporting?

3.   How can this error in FINSC_LEDGER be resolved correctly without causing inconsistencies?

I would really appreciate an explanation comparing ECC vs S/4HANA behavior, and best practices for ledger and company code design in S/4HANA.

Thank you in advance for your guidance.

Regards,
Suba

entry.title: How to create sales area through migration cockpit when we only filled company code only
entry.content:
Hi All,

I want to ask something about customer master through migration cockpit in SAP Public Cloud

First, i already make a customer master through migration cockpit and i only filled company data without filled sales area data.

is there any option to create the sales area data when we only filled the company data in the template before ?

i already try about Customer - extend existing record by new org levels but in only accept if i extend into new company code, when i want to create sales area through it, it will read the customer doesn't exist as a supplier.

if you have any similar solving like my problem in sap public cloud, i will need your help.

 

thankyou

But I've maintained the customer hierarchy in VDH1N and I can see the data in KNVH.

could someone help me.

Thanks.

Best regards.

Mary

entry.title: Billing plan details capturing issue against the contract item in SAP ECC
entry.content:
Hello All,

We have been facing an issue while processing the milestone billing against the contract item even we follow sequential process.

Config: 

1. we have enabled the billing plan at item category level and did the remain functional setup

Development the program with the below standard BAPIs/FMs

1. BAPI_CONTRACT_CREATEFROMDATA

2. BILLING_SCHEDULE_GENERATE

3.BILLING_SCHEDULE_GET_NUMBER

4.BILLING_SCHEDULE_SAVE  - Here we are trying to insert the billing plan details 

5.SD_SALES_DOCUMENT_SAVE

6.BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT

Outcome: The billing plan details aren't storing in the DB and can't be seen in VBKD,FPLA & FPLT etc.,

Note: We would appreciate any suggestions or inputs from your end.

entry.title: Block Pricing Condition Input in VA02
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have a requirement to block condition input in tax jurisdiction conditions when changing a sales order.

As far as I know, I need to maintain this configuration as “Manual entry has priority” for jurisdiction conditions.

 

Tax rates are coming from FTXP (FI), but users should not be able to change these rates.

I found some includes, but I am not sure how to use them. If you know anything about this, please let me know : 

LV69AFZZ
LV69AF01 - FORM tctrl_konditionen_init .


Kind regards,

Nedim Yilmaz

entry.title: License Inquiry and Clarification on CPU Metrics for SAP Business Objects
entry.content:
Hi all,

Could you provide me the solution for the following queries:

1) In our Production BO  environment, our current License shows a CPU metric of 4 at the CMC level, while the Windows OS reports 8 virtual processors. Could you please confirm whether the CPU metric at CMC refers to Physical CPUs or Virtual CPUs at the Windows level? Could you please provide clarity on this discrepancy?

2) If we plan to add additional vCPUs at the operating system level, will this require an additional license to be applied in the CMC?

3) If an additional license is required, can the existing license be reused for the added vCPUs, or must a new license key be imported?

NOTE: Out BO version is SAP BusinessObjects BI Platform 4.2 Support Pack 9 Patch 21 (Version: 14.2.9.5104) 

Regards,
Srikanth.

entry.title: About VSIT in scope item 5MQ
entry.content:
Dear sap experter.

I have active scope item 5MQ, and setting as below

sales org: 1310

plant: 1310

item category: tan

incoterms: DAP

Relevant for SFS VSiT Process

when I create sales order by 1310/1310/tan/dap,

the movement type still is 601 in delivery notes.

This means that it did not use the VSIT function.
